title: Satellogic ( NASDAQ : SATL ) Major Shareholder Fitzgerald Cantor Sells 388 , 827 Shares
description: Read Satellogic (NASDAQ:SATL) Major Shareholder Fitzgerald Cantor Sells 388,827 Shares at Markets Daily, Satellogic Inc. (NASDAQ:SATL – Get Free Report) major shareholder Fitzgerald Cantor sold 388,827 shares of the stock in a transaction on Thursday, January 29th. The shares were sold at an average price of $5.63, for a total value of $2,189,096.01. Following the sale, the insider directly owned 12,862,075 shares in the company, valued at $72,413,482.25. […]
